Name: Office Mayhem
About the game: When a man named Matthew Jarvis realizes that he has had enough of putting up with his BS job at Macro Hard Motors, He decides to finally resign from his livelihood in a rather unprofessional manner. Matthew assassinate his shmuck of a boss MR. Grumble with a stapler gun and proceeds to inflict absolute unmerciful chaos and mayhem upon his coworkers. Play as Matthew as he psychotically destroys office furniture, eliminates coworkers, fights security guards and battles his managers to the death! Explore the Macro Hard Motors corporate office building and experience all sorts of weird and whacky scenarios with your ex colleagues. As you progress, you will be able to acquire a wide variety of destructive weapons to inflict immense damage upon your environment such as a stapler, scissors, toilet plunger, an axe, etc. Score as much mayhem points as you possibly can in order to unlock new descending floors and to eventually free yourself from this monotonous hellhole for good. Once you've played through the main story, there will be other new fun and whacky game modes to try out as well. :)
